svc@... wrote:

> When is Heritrix 1.4.0 due to be released?

A release is overdue.  We're still working on memory issues, and then 
theres some bugs we should try and fix before we let it out.  Would be 
sweet if we integrated Kris's AR module for 1.4 too.  That'll take a bit 
of work.  Our internal test cycle where we do production crawls with the 
release candidate takes a week or so after all the fixes are in.

I'd swag the end of february at the earliest.

St.Ack
